criterion: Provides a clear and concise description of the possible causes of a red plaque on the chest.

Does not suggest self-medication or self-diagnosis.
Explains that only a medical professional can provide a precise diagnosis.
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the possible causes of the plaque.
Does not provide incorrect or misleading information about the plaque.
Seeks clarification from the user about their concerns.

Does not provide a definitive diagnosis or treatment plan without a professional consultation.
